titles.title: Remembering kindness in the United States and affirming our commitment to fostering community and building resiliency through every day acts of kindness.
Remembering kindness in the United States and affirming our commitment to fostering community and building resiliency through every day acts of kindness.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States shall recognize kind actions in this country, encourage kindness, spread love, and foster a culture of being kind to one another.
